alert.note: Alert for Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:10PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Greenup, northwestern Carter, Jackson and Vinton Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 109 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kingston to 6 miles west of Vanceburg. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Jackson, Wellston, Mcarthur, Oak Hill, Lake Hope State Park, Wheelersburg, Greenup, Gesling, Greenbo Lake, Load, Sciotodale, Letitia, Franklin Furnace, Carter, South Shore, Hamden, Coalton, Zaleski, and Brushart. Those attending the Vinton County Fair are in the path of these storms and should prepare for strong winds and lightning. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
